function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low certainty of evidence in studies on the association between temperature and humidity with the spread rate of COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the true impact of temperature and humidity on the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct further controlled studies to increase the certainty of evidence","Technologies":"Controlled experimental designs, data analysis techniques","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Observational studies with inherent risk of bias in the assessment of climate variables","Impact":"Risk of misleading or inaccurate conclusions about the influence of climate on COVID-19 spread","Mitigation":"Improve study designs, account for migration patterns and isolation policies","Technologies":"Advanced statistical methods, data modeling","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, academia"},{"Description":"Homogeneity of results among the included studies","Impact":"Potential overreliance on limited evidence and lack of diversity in study findings","Mitigation":"Encourage diverse and inclusive research samples, explore conflicting findings","Technologies":"Diverse data collection methods, inclusive study designs","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Research funding organizations"}]}
